channel.title: Pip Foweraker - Blog & Essays
channel.description: Updates, essays, and research from Pip Foweraker's digital lab.

item.title: Building a Personal Homepage
item.description: Creating a static site that I can update quickly while building something more substantial. Using design elements from my game projects to create a cohesive digital presence.

item.title: P(DOOM) Data Architecture
item.description: Exploring historical events in AI safety through structured data and cross-repository integration patterns.

item.title: On Building Digital Systems
item.description: Thoughts on creating robust, maintainable systems that serve both human needs and technical requirements...

item.title: The Art of Code Documentation
item.description: Documentation as a form of communication and future-proofing. Why ASCII compliance matters...

item.title: Working in Public
item.description: The benefits and challenges of developing projects in the open. Building in public as a learning tool...
